## CustomAnswersAgents interface

Additional agents and their versions used to create the Answers experience. The information for these agents is added to the Client-SDK HTTP header for Answers API requests along with that of the ANSWERS\_HEADLESS and ANSWERS\_CORE agents.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CustomAnswersAgents extends CustomClientSdk 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [CustomClientSdk](./answers-headless.customclientsdk.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [ANSWERS\_HEADLESS?](./answers-headless.customanswersagents.answers_headless.md) | never | <i>(Optional)</i> The ANSWERS\_HEADLESS agent should not be supplied. Instead, it will be automatically added to the header and populated with the version of Answers Headless being used. |
